籤詩版本二:
Njengedada elindiza lisuka esibayeni, ngifuna ukuthola omunye umzimba kodwa angikwazi
Kunzima ukuphuma enyakatho, eningizimu, empumalanga nasentshonalanga.Le hexagram iyisaba ngempela inzondo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nedada eliziphonsa emanzini (ekhejini).
Yonke into ayinalutho futhi ayinaqiniso kangako.
解曰: Akunakwenzeka (akunakwenzeka) ukungena emzimbeni. Ukuhlehla wukuba (in) ukwazi. Gcina ikhanda lakho liphansi futhi uqonde. Konke kukho.
籤詩故事一:
◇Qin wehlule futhi wathumba abaphathi abathathu
UDuke Mu waseQin akazange alalele iseluleko sikangqongqoshe wakhe ongumakadebona u-Jian Gong futhi wathumela amasosha ukuba ayohlasela izwe laseZheng.
Ibutho lamaJin layenga ibutho lamaQin esigodini esiyingozi, indlela eya ngaphambili yayivimbekile. Amasosha amaJin nhlangothi zombili ajikijela umlilo, isibabule, kanye ne-saltpeter. okubangela inqwaba yabalimala.
Bahluliwe babanjwa bobathathu ojenene.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, umuntu uvalelekile, ufuna imali, isigebengu, ukuhweba, ukuchitha umshado, ukujezisa, ukulimaza uLiujia, ukugebenga abahamba ngezinyawo, ukuvimba amasimu, izikelemu ezilahlekile, isifo semfuyo, ukucinga abantu, ukumangalela, amashwa, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekile engalungile. , izifo ezimbi, ezisakaza izintaba namathuna
古人: UQin wanqoba futhi wathumba abaphathi abathathu
